title: Dodge if you see Mi Sum Dum Kun
body:
IF you see this guy DODGE the game immediatley this guy will call a lane and will feed a act like a cunt a feed all game.

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Mi+Sum+Dum+Kun

You're better off with losing Lp and 45 mins of your time and -20 LP +/- 

Please moderator if you see this thread ban this clown.
